articles.author: Julia Kollewe, Gwyn Topham
articles.title: Oil price jumps as high as $113; natural gas prices spike to record highs – business live - The Guardian
articles.description: US and European shares push higher, while rouble drops 8% and Moscow stock exchange stays shut for third day, as Russia bombards Ukrainian cities

articles.author: Silvia Amaro
articles.title: Welcoming Ukraine into the EU would send a 'very clear message to Putin,' Kyiv lawmaker says - CNBC
articles.description: Swiftly allowing Ukraine to join the European Union would send a clear message to Russia's Vladimir Putin, a Ukrainian lawmaker told CNBC Wednesday.
articles.content:
Swiftly allowing Ukraine to join the European Union would send a clear message to Russia's Vladimir Putin that his strategy has failed, a Ukrainian member of parliament told CNBC Wednesday.

articles.content:

articles.title: Russia’s biggest lender Sberbank exits Europe - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: State-controlled bank announces it is pulling out of European markets amid tightening of Western sanctions.
articles.content:

articles.title: European Southern Observatory researchers find 'vampire' star sucking outer layers of companion star - ABC News
articles.description: Astronomers have had a good look at what happens when a "vampire" star sucks the outer layers of material from a companion star, stripping its "bitten" victim down to a mere stellar core.
